questions.text: When Rebecca told Woody she would live longer by eating healthy, what did Woody say?
questions.correct: Since she was always complaining about her life, why would she want to make it longer?
options: He'd like to live longer too, could he try her healthy snacks?
What's the use, you'll probably just get hit by a car or something?
questions.explanation:
Since she was always complaining about her life, why would she want to make it longer?.

	Rebecca told him to "shut up" in reply. Rebecca was a neurotic so when things didn't go her way she complained that she wanted to die.

Whitey died.

	Whitey died at 9:00. He was Lilith's favorite lab rat.

questions.text: Lilith said her research never harmed Whitey.
questions.explanation:
True.

	She said she gave the rat anything he needed.  In fact she said, "That rat was the envy of the others".

Paul.

	Paula was played by Beth Toussant. She was known for playing the voice of the female caller in "Scream 3". The other guys kept saying "Hey Hey Paul, Hey Hey Paula" which was from a song called "Hey Hey Paula". Paul didn't get it so they finally gave up.

questions.text: What did Woody say was bite sized?
questions.explanation:
Snowballs.

	Snowballs were a dessert type of snack that looked like a giant snowball. The guys were all razzing Rebecca about her decision to eat healthy.

questions.text: What was Lilith carrying in her purse?
questions.explanation:
A dead rat.

	Frasier was freaked out when he saw this. He decided to help Lilith by throwing the dead rat in the trash.

questions.text: What did Lilith do when she found out what Frasier had done?
questions.correct: She threw Frasier in the trash.
options: She smacked him across the face.
She told him she wanted a divorce.
questions.explanation:
She threw Frasier in the trash.

	Frasier said Lilith was still grieving. Frasier didn't understand why Lilith was carrying Whitey but never asked her for an explanation.

questions.text: Why did Paul tell Sam that Paula liked him (him being Paul)?
questions.explanation:
She was a "chubby chaser".

	Paula liked men who were overweight. She later implied she found Norm attractive also.

questions.text: Did Frasier make it to the interview for Fredrick's preschool in time?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Lilith said that the school was conferring now (when Frasier arrived). Further, she left a message with Woody saying she new Frasier would forget about the interview, and sure enough she was right.

The school's pet hamster.

	Lilith said one of Sylvia's babies looked like Whitey. She then flipped out causing Frasier to lose it as well. The school said, "We'll get back to you," which implied because of Frasier and Lilith's actions, Frederick was most likely not going to get into that preschool.
